title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 623.1 - Regulations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 623.1 - Regulations

State Regulations

The provisions of this Part shall apply to all persons
entering upon or using the department's environmental education centers
commonly known as Five Rivers environmental conservation center, Rogers
environmental education center and Stony Kill environmental education
center. (a) Center grounds are open
sunrise to sunset. Visitors are not permitted on the grounds after dark, except
by written permission or for attendance at scheduled programs. (b) Plants and animals shall not be removed
or introduced without permission. (c) Vehicles are to be parked in designated
areas only. (d) Vehicles are
permitted on restricted roadways or fields only by written
permission. (e) Only pedestrian
traffic is permitted on trails, fields and restricted roadways. (f) Pets are not allowed on center grounds
except by written permission. (g) Picnicking is permitted in designated areas only. Fires are prohibited, except
in specially marked areas when conditions permit. (h) No alcoholic beverages are allowed on the
center grounds. (i) Littering is
not permitted. (j) Athletic games
are permitted in designated areas only. (k) Ice skating, swimming and boating are
prohibited, except as an integral part of a center program. (l) Hunting and trapping are prohibited, except in designated areas and by written permission only. Fishing is permitted
in designated areas only. (m) Firearms are prohibited on the grounds, except by written permission. (n) Visitors are not permitted in restricted
areas, except by written permission or when accompanied by department
personnel. (o) Visitors shall
comply with the instruction of center personnel and with notices posted by the
department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
623.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
